ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed! They will soon know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Indeed they will come to know soon;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No indeed; soon will they come to know;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (What they think is certainly despicable!). They will soon come to know (the reality).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Surely yes, they will soon come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay, they will come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! they shall soon come to know
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed; they shall soon know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but they will come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But they will soon come to know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By no means! anon they shall know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No indeed! Soon they will know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily, they shall soon (come to) know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, they will come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No! They are going to know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:4] No indeed! — a disavowal — they will come to know, what will befall them for their rejection of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay) this is a reply to the disbelievers, (but they will come to know!) They will come to know upon the advent of death what will be done with them.
